Welcome to badgegen’s documentation!¶

CLI¶

usage: badgegen [-h] [--left-width [LEFT_WIDTH]] [--right-width [RIGHT_WIDTH]]
                [--left-text [LEFT_TEXT]] [--right-text [RIGHT_TEXT]]

Named Arguments¶

--left-width

Width of the left cell, None if fit to text

Default: 150

--right-width

Width of the left cell, None if fit to text

Default: 150

--left-text

Text for the left cell. Can be python format string

Default: “test”

--right-text

Text for the right cell. Can be python format string

Default: “100%”

API Documentation¶

BadgeGeneration Module.

class badgegen.BadgeGenerator(left_width=150, right_width=150, left_text='test', right_text='100%', height=50, radius=5)¶

Badge Generator.

left_rectangle(width=75.0, height=25.0, radius=5.0)¶
right_rectangle(width=150.0, height=25.0, radius=5.0, corner=75.0)¶
